title: Cafe Mimi on Sale!!!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907015429im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/CafeMimi_6730.png)

It’s on sale and very very well made. Kerning is perfect and it’s cute too.

Fast food cost more than $20 these days.

Tell a friend,

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: PS... Hopefully, Verdigris will be next on the list!!!!
